sections.title: Getting Started
sections.summary: Sign in, create a chat, upload a video, and run analysis.
items: After sign-in, click New chat on the left
Choose an indoor video and click Run Analysis
Wait for completion to view frames and report

sections.title: Video Analysis
sections.summary: The system samples frames, filters noise, and selects representative images.
items: Automatically filters duplicate, blurry, or dark frames
Representative frames are used for the report and preview
steps: Watch the progress and status messages
Open the representative frames after completion

sections.title: Reading the Report
sections.summary: The report includes risks, scores, recommendations, and an action plan.

sections.title: Asking Questions
sections.summary: Ask about specific rooms or the overall report for best results.
items: Ask about specific rooms: Kitchen / Bathroom / Bedroom
Ask about the overall report: scores, top risks, recommendations
More specific questions lead to better answers

sections.title: Common Issues
sections.summary: Fix common web issues such as upload problems or missing reports.
items: Upload is slow or fails: check your network and try again
Video is too large: test with a 30-60 second clip
Not an indoor scene: results may be inaccurate
No report visible: confirm analysis is complete and reload the chat
Report answer seems unclear: ask a specific room or score
steps: Reload the page and reopen the current chat
